f2dfaf4212d5d1a330d78374a88f6d506cdb4e97.message: Flags the use of a predictable random value from `scala.util.Random`. This can lead to vulnerabilities when used in security contexts, such as in a CSRF token, password reset token, or any other secret value. To fix this, use java.security.SecureRandom instead.
